tool.name: OpenSwathFileSplitter
tool.description: Splits SWATH files into n files, each containing one window.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts_cond.out_qc_FLAG: mkdir out_qc && #end if #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts_cond.out_qc_FLAG: -out_qc 'out_qc/output.${gxy2omsext("json")}' #end if #end if #if not($adv_opts_cond.out_qc_FLAG): | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts_cond.out_qc_FLAG: && mv 'out_qc/output.${gxy2omsext("json")}' '$out_qc' #end if #end if

param.name: outputDirectory
param.label: Output path to store the split files

param.name: out_qc_FLAG
param.label: Generate output out_qc (Optional QC meta data (charge distribution in MS1))
param.help: Only works with mzML input files

tool.help:
Splits SWATH files into n files, each containing one window.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/UTILS_OpenSwathFileSplitter.html
